title: Tangent Function - period constant from graph

content.description: All coordinates are approximate. Moving from left to right: Two dashed vertical lines are parallel to the y axis through x equals negative 3 and x equals positive 3. The curves appear asymptotic to the dashed vertical lines. The first curve begins approximately from the point (negative 6 comma 0), increases as the curve trends up gradually then steeply to the right through the point (negative 4 comma 1.8) and exits to the left of the first dashed vertical line at the top of quadrant 2. The second curve begins from the bottom of quadrant 3 to the right of the first dashed vertical line, increases as the curve trends up steeply then gradually to the right, crosses the origin, continues gradually up to the right through the point (2 comma 1.9), then continues up steeply, exiting to the left of the second dashed vertical line at the top of quadrant 1. The third curve begins from the bottom of quadrant 4 to the right of the second dashed vertical line, increases as the curve trends up steeply up then gradually to the right through the point (4 comma negative 2) and ends approximately at the point (6 comma 0).
content.question: ​The graph of <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals tan open parentheses b x close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>tan</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>b</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a constant, is shown in the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane. What is the value of <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
